Name: Go! Go! Nippon! ~My First Trip to Japan~
About the game: The week you spend in Japan will certainly be memorable!!! Get a taste of the foreign travel offered by printed guidebooks. Enjoy a tour around Japan from the comfort of your own home! As the game's protagonist, you'll travel to famous Japanese sightseeing spots in the company of a pair of beautiful young sisters. The girls will describe the spots, take you out to dinner, and grow closer to you throughout your travels. The thrill of taking a trip through Japan with pretty girls is the experience offered by this 'Guide Game' -- a guidebook in game format! Beautiful Tour Guides!! Famous Japanese Sightseeing Spots!! Delicious Japanese Dishes!! *In order to unlock achievements, you will need the 2016 version DLC.
